channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for TN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for TN

item.title: Report X-2025040003
item.description:
Report X-2025040003

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-20T00:57:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-27
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the MEMH location a fiberboard box was found with signs of a release. Inside of the fiberboard box was a single metal can which was damaged on the top chime causing a release. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

item.title: Report X-2025040002
item.description:
Report X-2025040002

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-20T00:57:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-25
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations a the MEMH location a plastic bucket was dropped during the unloading process. The bucket cracked on the bottom spilling the contents. It was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
